articles.author: Matt Leone
articles.title: Better Call Saul season 6 trailer teases Saul Goodman’s full evolution - Polygon
articles.description: Jimmy McGill is coming back for his final season, and a new trailer shows the sorts of trouble and hijinks he will get into. The sixth season premieres April 18 on AMC, with the second part set for a July 11 release date.
